                                                                                            "inlineScript": "/**\n * @param {params} params\n * @param {api} params.api\n * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers\n */\nfunction evaluateProperty({\n    api,\n    helpers\n}) {\n    var paramState = \"^state!=Closed\";\n    if (api.state.parFilters && api.state.parFilters.length > 0) {\n        if (api.state.parFilters.length > 1) {\n            paramState = `^state=${api.state.parFilters.join(\",\")}`;\n        } else {\n            paramState = \"^state=\" + api.state.parFilters[0];\n        }\n    }\n\n    return `maintenance=false^cmdb_ci=${api.state.ciSysID}${paramState}`;\n}",
                                                                                            "scriptSysId": "8bd6121747af71d0118c2d8fe16d4348",

                                                                                "overrides": {

                                                                                        {
                                                                                            "definition": {

                                                                                                "type": "MACROPONENT"

                                                                                            "elementLabel": "Heading 8",
                                                                                            "eventMappings": [

                                                                                            "isHidden": {
                                                                                                "type": "JSON_LITERAL",
                                                                                                "value": null
                                                                                            },
                                                                                            "preset": null,
                                                                                            "propertyValues": {
                                                                                                "hasNoMargin": {
                                                                                                    "type": "JSON_LITERAL",
                                                                                                    "value": false
                                                                                                },
                                                                                                "label": {
                                                                                                    "script": {
                                                                                                        "apiVersion": "2.0.0",
                                                                                                        "controllerElementId": null,
                                                                                                        "inlineScript": "/**\n * @param {params} params\n * @param {api} params.api\n * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers\n */\nfunction evaluateProperty({\n    api,\n    helpers\n}) {\n    var metricLabel = api.item.value.label.displayValue;\n\n    // Hard coded separation\n    function separateCompoundWords(word) {\n        const separateWords = {\n            cpupercent: 'cpu percent',\n            queuelength: 'queue length',\n            loadavgsec: 'load avg sec',\n            // Add more mappings as needed\n        };\n\n        return separateWords[word.toLowerCase()] || word;\n    }\n\n    var formattedMetricLabel = metricLabel\n        .replace(/_/g, ' ') // Replace underscores with spaces\n        .split(' ') // Split the label into words\n        .map(separateCompoundWords) // Separate compound words\n        .join(' ') // Join the words back into a string\n        .replace(/\\bcpu\\b/gi, 'CPU') // Capitalize \"cpu\" (case-insensitive)\n        .replace(/\\b\\w/g, c => c.toUpperCase()) // Capitalize every word\n        .replace(/percent(age)?$/i, '(%)') // Replace \"percent\" or \"percentage\" with \"(%)\"\n        .replace(/\\bkb\\b/gi, '(KB)') // Replace \"kb\" with \"(KB)\"\n        .replace(/\\bmb\\b/gi, '(MB)') // Replace \"mb\" with \"(MB)\"\n        .replace(/\\bsec\\b/gi, '(s)'); // Replace \"sec\" with \"(s)\"\n\n    return formattedMetricLabel;\n    // return api.item.value.metric_type_id.displayValue;\n}",
                                                                                                        "scriptSysId": "bde0539197c40ed0917df9f0f053aff7",
                                                                                                        "target": null
                                                                                                    },
                                                                                                    "type": "CLIENT_TRANSFORM_SCRIPT"
